ruleBookInfo.author: userName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
(()=>{
  body = JSON.parse(result).body;
  body.tocUrl = "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/series/" + body.id + "/content_titles?lang=zh";
  return JSON.stringify(body);
})();
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: title

ruleContent.content:
<js>
(()=>{

var json = result.match('{\"time.+}')[0];
java.log(json);
json = JSON.parse(json);

var novels = (()=>{
    var result = "";
    for(var key in json.novel){
        result += JSON.stringify(json.novel[key]);
    }
    return JSON.parse(result);
})();

return novels.content;

})();
</js>
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
(()=>{

var json = result.match('{\"time.+}')[0];
json = JSON.parse(json);

var novels = (()=>{
    var result = "";
    for(var key in json.novel){
        result += JSON.stringify(json.novel[key]);
    }
    return JSON.parse(result);
})();

var nextUrl = (()=>{

    var hasNext = novels.seriesNavData != null && novels.seriesNavData.next != null

    if (hasNext){
        return "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/show.php?id="+novels.seriesNavData.next.id;
    }else {
        return ""
    }

})();

return nextUrl;

})();
</js>

ruleSearch.author: userName
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
(function(result){
  var result = JSON.parse(result);
  var returnList = [];

  let responseList = result.body.novel.data;
  responseList.forEach((v, i) => {
    result = v;
    result.bookUrl = "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/series/" + result.id;
    returnList.push(result);
  });

  return returnList;
})(result);
</js>
ruleSearch.name: title

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
(()=>{
  chapterList = JSON.parse(result).body;
  chapterList.forEach((v, i) => {
    v.chapterUrl = "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/show.php?id=" + v.id;
  });
  return chapterList;
})();
</js>
